China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 5 日星期五 18:47:36 GMT 120
US sets final food can steel dumping duties on China, Canada, Germany, KoreaThe U.S. Commerce Department said on Friday it found that imports of tin mill products from Canada, China, Germany, and South Korea are being dumped onto the U.S. market and imports of tin mill products from China are also being subsidized. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 16:28:26 GMT CT47RJ3C75ML5LBOTZXEA2PNOY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/us-says-tin-mill-products-china-canada-germany-being-dumped-2024-01-05/Doina Chiacu, David Lawder市场商品
Spirits makers exposed to China's EU brandy probeChina has launched an anti-dumping investigation on brandy imported from the European Union, a step that appears to be mainly targeted at France. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 15:49:14 GMT DXG653BE2NICJNEVF5TZQXJAWY https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/spirits-makers-expose-chinas-eu-brandy-probe-2024-01-05/Reuters商业零售与消费品
President of Maldives to visit China Jan 8-12, Beijing saysThe president of the Maldives, Mohamed Muizzu, will pay a state visit to China from Jan. 8 to 12, the Chinese foreign ministry said in statement on Friday, in what would be a high-profile snub to the island nation's huge neighbour India. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 13:48:33 GMT YME5AA4JNVLXHJUFLPXY2HONWU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/president-maldives-visit-china-jan-8-12-beijing-says-2024-01-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
Industry experts react to China's anti-dumping probe into EU brandyChina launched on Friday an anti-dumping investigation into brandy imported from the European Union, which will focus on brandy in containers of less than 200 litres (44 British gallons). Fri, 05 Jan 2024 13:18:06 GMT EGDVZVGJYZJHXLFANWO4U3A644 https://www.reuters.com/business/industry-experts-react-chinas-anti-dumping-probe-into-eu-brandy-2024-01-05/Reuters商业
China-U.S. cooperation 'no longer an option ... but an imperative' - Wang YiChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Friday the most urgent task for Sino-U.S. relations is to establish a correct understanding and cooperation between the two sides, stressing it is "no longer an option ... but an imperative" for the world. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 11:54:30 GMT SF4OYDZENFILXLWOGK5V6TV4KI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-us-cooperation-no-longer-optional-imperative-both-world-wang-yi-2024-01-05/Liz Lee, Ethan Wang世界中国
Chinese wealth manager Zhongzhi files for bankruptcy liquidationChinese wealth manager Zhongzhi Enterprise Group has filed for bankruptcy liquidation after failing to repay debt, as the firm grapples with a deepening property market downturn. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 10:45:30 GMT SSE2R3OBVNPSLMATY7MKJFNRVA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/chinese-court-accepts-wealth-manager-zhongzhis-bankruptcy-application-2024-01-05/Reuters商业金融
BlackRock appoints Hua Fan head of China, succeeding Tony Tang -sourcesBlackRock Inc has appointed Hua Fan, formerly general manager of its majority-owned China asset management unit, as head of China, two sources with knowledge of the matter said. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 10:12:51 GMT NLPIOANWOBIXLGCNIQRCVMSVKY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/blackrock-appoints-hua-fan-head-china-succeeding-tony-tang-sources-2024-01-05/Selena Li商业金融
Fairy-tale ice sculptures lure droves of tourists into China's HarbinChina's annual Ice and Snow Festival, with its fairy-tale ice sculptures, opened on Friday attracting throngs of tourists who shuffled carefully over the slippy ice and snow and dragged their children in sledges around the park. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 08:14:50 GMT VZTAN76V4NOY7G2BHQXFEPT7PU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fairy-tale-ice-sculptures-lure-droves-tourists-into-chinas-harbin-2024-01-05/Nicoco Chan, Liz Lee世界中国
Tesla to fix 1.62 mln vehicles in China - regulatorTesla is doing an effective recall on 1.62 million vehicles, including its models S, X, 3 and Y in China, the market regulator said on Friday. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:57:34 GMT 4YI55BJA2RJCNF3TD3W73SRCCY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-fix-162-mln-vehicles-china-regulator-2024-01-05/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Thermo Fisher halts forensic tech sales in TibetThermo Fisher Scientific has pledged to stop selling forensic technology and equipment in Tibet that could be used for identifying individuals, a spokesperson for the company said. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 07:37:18 GMT MN4V5SWVVVK4PCCJCOJFNRACO4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/thermo-fisher-halts-forensic-tech-sales-tibet-2024-01-05/Andrew Silver技术
Philippines remains open to diplomacy with China - national security adviserThe Philippines remains open to diplomatic discussions with China and believes the two nations can achieve a resolution to disputes over the South China Sea through peaceful dialogue, its national security adviser said in a statement on Friday. Fri, 05 Jan 2024 06:47:19 GMT YMDJ3HHIU5O2ZMJL3GBWC5XPWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-remains-open-diplomatic-discussions-with-china-national-security-2024-01-05/Reuters世界亚太地区
